channel.title: No-ip.com
channel.description: what is the exact purpose of it? besides from moparisthebest.com ralated stuff. i don't see what it is used for besides from shitty domains.

item.title: No-ip.com
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Anything you would normally use an ip for, a no-ip is easier to remember and you dont have to worry if your ip changes constantly, you just use that no-ip duc thing. I use my no-ip for my website, for my wow server, for my rs server, for my ftp server, if i can get it working i will use it for my mail server also, people use it to conenct to my vnc, and call me on net meeting also, anything…

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip.com

item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

to host games, not just for moparscape, but other games. Halo CE can use them as a dedicated host, i have pretty much 5 servers from a no-ip.
